T02D2760:138b-0: @138b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2760:138b-3: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
T02D2760:138b-4: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D2760:138b-6: dpal ldan ye shes dkyil 'khor che //
T02D2760:138b-7: don kun grub byed brtag pa'o //
T02D2760:138b-8: rgyu skar rgyal po rgyal la bab pa'am //
T02D2760:138b-9: yang na zla ba tshes dang zla ba nya //
T02D2760:138b-10: sna tshogs me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa'i tshe //
T02D2760:138b-11: skal bzang rnams kyis mgon mchod sdig pa bsal //
T02D2760:138b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan gyis spras //
T02D2760:138b-13: sna tshogs dri bsung dang ldan pa'i //
T02D2760:138b-14: me tog gcal bkram lha ba lhub can //
T02D2760:138b-15: mchod rdzas yo byad sprin gti bas nas //
T02D2760:138b-16: stobs chen sngon 'gro nyi ma dang po bum pa dang ni lha //
T02D2760:138b-17: lhag par gnas byas gnyis pa ting 'dzin rgyal po la gnas bzlas //
T02D2760:138b-18: gsum pa mchod sbyin go rims nus sbyar bzod par gsol //
T02D2760:138b-19: de mthar bkra shis rdo rje chus bkrus dngos grub blang bar bya //
T02D2760:138b-20: bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02D2760:138b-21: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas su //
T02D2760:138b-22: rdo rje 'khor lo phyag rgya yis //
T02D2760:139a-3: rdo rjes mtshon pa dpal chen nyid //
T02D2760:139a-4: shar sogs rin chen rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo rnam bdun gter chen bcas lha mo //
T02D2760:139a-5: khyams bzang rab mnyam beed'urya yi ngos la nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchod pa yi //
T02D2760:139a-6: lha mo rnams dang de bzhin sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa sogs dges rol pa'o //
T02D2760:139a-7: mu khyud khor yug bkra shis kyi //
T02D2760:139a-8: rdzas bcu grub pa nyi shus bskor //
T02D2760:139a-9: dpal med lha rdzas yod byad kyis //
T02D2760:139a-10: shin tu phun tshogs brtse ba yin //
T02D2760:139a-11: aom a'a:hr'i:tsakra warti mandal siddhi phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2760:139a-12: shes rab thabs byung skad cig sbyor bas bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur rgyal gsal bskyed la //
T02D2760:139a-13: snying po las 'phros lcags kyu'i zer gyis ji bzhin
T02D2760:139a-14: nyid bkug mnyes byas dbyer med gzhug / bdag dang
T02D2760:139a-15: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bcas bzlas rdo rje phreng rgyun
T02D2760:139a-17: bum pa bzang bkang thun mtshams kun rtag mnyam gzhag che gnas dngos kun mchod brtson bya //
